title: Person Light Skin Tone Curly Hair
description: Depicts a person with light skin tone and curly hair, celebrating diverse hair textures. It can be used to represent individuals with curly hair, or to convey a sense of individuality and style.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with curly hair emoji features a vibrant individual with a light skin tone, whose voluminous, textured curls are artfully rendered with Apple's signature 3D gloss and soft lighting. The emoji's rounded edges and gentle contours give it a friendly, approachable feel, representing individuality and unique personal style. This emoji is a delightful way to express personality, creativity, or simply represent someone with beautiful, natural curls.
